metadata.title: CVE-2018-3639 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution andspeculative execution of memory reads before the addresses of all priormemory writes are known may allow unauthorized disclosure of information toan attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis, akaSpeculative Store Bypass (SSB), Variant 4.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-3639` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-22-generic - 4.15.0-22.24
linux-image-4.15.0-22-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-22.24
linux-image-4.15.0-22-lowlatency - 4.15.0-22.24

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-22-generic - 4.15.0-22.24
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-22-lowlatency - 4.15.0-22.24
No subscription required
